Proyecto Triangulo (Ruby Koans)
Os

Proyecto Triangulo (Ruby Koans)

31 Dic 2011

def triangle(*args)
  return :equilateral if args.uniq.size == 1
  return :isosceles if args.uniq.size == 2
  return :scalene if args.uniq.size == 3
end

>> triangle(2, 2, 2)
=> :equilateral
>> triangle(10, 10, 10)
=> :equilateral

>> triangle(3, 4, 4)
=> :isosceles
>> triangle(4, 3, 4)
=> :isosceles
>> triangle(4, 4, 3)
=> :isosceles
>> triangle(10, 10, 2)
=> :isosceles

>> triangle(3, 4, 5)
=> :scalene
>> triangle(10, 11, 12)
=> :scalene
>> triangle(5, 4, 2)
=> :scalene
